title: Tuna and sweetcorn pasta salad
description: You can find fun wholemeal pasta shapes that will please kids when you add this to their lunchbox. Ready in 10.Each serving provides 230kcal, 16g protein, 28g carbohydrate (of which 3g sugars), 5g fat (of which 0.6g saturates), 5g fibre and 0.1g salt.
ingredients: 150g/5oz whole wheat pasta, cooked according to packet instructions
150g/5½oz tinned tuna in spring water, drained
